answers.answer: Started with my first at 28wks and they were able to manage it for 7wks before I had a csection. This time started at 15wks, went into preterm labour at 27wks but still in hospital and holding on at 28 almost 29wks now! Wishing you lots of luck:)
Thanks! Wishing you luck as well :-)

question: I'm in the hospital with preeclampsia I'm hoping I am discharged being that my blood pressure is under control they just found protein in my urine and dips in the baby's heart beat has this happened to anyone if so what was the outcome
title: 32+6 days preeclampsia
